body_html: Hey @roxxx33 - thanks! I've added a comment on a commit. In addition to that, this PR doesn't include the migration file that adds the new database column; it only contains the updated schema.rb.

body: Hey @roxxx33 - thanks! I've added a comment on a commit. In addition to that, this PR doesn't include the migration file that adds the new database column; it only contains the updated `schema.rb`.
